subs.text: "pngWriter" has been ready to go for about six months. I wanted to do some other projects first, and think about what I wanted to do it. I see more people with graphic tweets, but mostly from professional publications. pngWriter is for normal people (and people who work in professional news orgs).
It does not work in Safari. Be sure to read the docs for other caveats.
Here's an example of the kind of post you can do with pngWriter.

So here goes. I took off the whitelist. It's now open. I'm not promoting it beyond Scripting News readers for now. Don't abuse the product, it's here to help make Twitter more usable. If it isn't being used responsibly, I'll take it back. :balloon:
